start.speaker: Skyreach Librarian
start.text:
We catalog vows so the sky doesn’t forget where to put the stars.

Lately, the entries keep rewriting themselves. That’s not ink—it’s weather.

choices.text: Let it change; learn what it becomes.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: The monastery returns to silence. For now. In the margins, the wind keeps practicing handwriting.
